text: Lonely Island () is a 2014 Chinese suspense thriller horror film directed by Lian Tao and Wang Kunhao. It was released on October 31. ==Cast== *Li Yiyi *Tian Suhao *Mao Yi ==Reception== By November 3, the film had earned ¥2.46 million at the Chinese box office. ==References== Category:2010s horror thriller films Category:2014 horror films Category:Chinese films Category:Chinese horror thriller films Category:2014 films
title: Lonely Island (film)
